name: BOLA IBRAHIM
details: Bola Ibrahim has over 20 years of banking experience with hands-on experience which spans through Banking Operations, Internal Control, Internal Audit, Risk Management, Trade and Treasury Management activities and to Financial Control functions. In the course of his career, he has participated in different banking business combinations, mergers & acquisitions and business transformation.

He is a Chartered Accountant, a Fellow of the Institute of Chartered Accountant of Nigeria (FCA) and a Chartered Banker with the qualification of Associateship of the Chartered Institute of Bankers (ACIB). He is also an Associate member of the Chartered Institute of Taxation of Nigeria (CITN).

Bola holds a Masters Degree in Finance from the University of Leicester, UK. He is an Alumni of Winsconsin School of Business in the United States of America, and also, an Alumni of Lagos Business School (LBS). He had a Bachelor of Science in Banking and Finance with second class upper, from Ogun State University (now Olabisi Onabanjo University).
Bola started his banking career with Standard Trust Bank STB, which later merged with UBA. He later joined BankPHB Plc which later transformed to Keystone Bank Limited.
